import React from'react';import{BsInstagram,BsArrowLeftShort,BsArrowRightShort}from'react-icons/bs';import{SubHeading}from'../../components';import{images}from'../../constants';import'./Gallery.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Gallery=function Gallery(){var scrollRef=React.useRef(null);var scroll=function scroll(direction){var current=scrollRef.current;if(direction==='left'){current.scrollLeft-=300;}else{current.scrollLeft+=300;}};var handleClick=function handleClick(){window.location.href='https://www.instagram.com';// Instagram linkini yerleştirin.
